text: ninnal allahuvinayi hajjum umrayum tikaveate ‎nirvahikkuka. athava, ninnal upareadhikkappetta l ‎ninnalkk sadhyamaya ritiyil balinatattuka. ‎balimrgam atinre sthanatt ettuvealam ninnal ‎talamutiyetukkarut. athava, arenkilum reagam ‎karanamea talayile marrentenkilum prayasam mulamea ‎muti etuttal prayascittamayi neampetukkukayea ‎danam nalkukayea balinatattukayea venam. ninnal ‎nirbhayavasthayilavukayum umra nirvahicc hajj ‎kalanvare sekaryam upayeagappetuttuka ‎yumanenkil sadhyamaya bali nalkuka. ‎arkkenkilum bali sadhyamayillenkil patt neamp ‎purnamayi anusthikkanam. munnennam hajj ‎velayilum elennam tiriccettiya sesavum. ‎kutumbatteateatt masjidulharaminre atutt ‎tamasikkattavarkkullatan i niyamam. allahuve ‎suksikkuka. ariyuka: allahu kathinamayi ‎siksikkunnavanan. ‎
